title: Charmm Baby Bottle, Toy Cleanser 1L - BUY TWO GET ONE FREE
raw_desc: Gentle and Effective Cleaning: Our baby bottle cleanser is designed to effectively clean bottles, teats, teething toys, and cutlery, while being gentle on your baby's delicate skin. Easy to Use: Simply add a small amount of cleanser to warm water and mix until it lathers. Use the mixture to clean your baby's bottles, teats, teething toys, and cutlery. Rinse thoroughly with water and air dry.
